Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 23/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
